net.alexanderdev.lightdrive.state

Class DefaultState

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.alexanderdev.lightdrive.state.State
      • net.alexanderdev.lightdrive.state.DefaultState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Renderable, Controllable

    public final class DefaultState
extends State
    A State which serves as both a placeholder, so that no null checks have to be made if no states have been added to the StateManager, and as a sort of "Hello World" visualization, to test that the library functions properly.
    Since:
    May 19, 2015, 11:23:47 PM
    Author:
    Christian Bryce Alexander
